full_text: Complete your look with the unique style of this cute knit purse. Stitched in Bernat Maker, you’ll reveal an impressive big stitch look as you master simple knit and purl techniques to create the lovely seed stitch fabric. This knit knot purse is so entertaining to make, you’ll surely want to create a few in different colors to match everything in your closet. It’s a great gift option too! MATERIALS Bernat® Maker™ (8.8 oz/250 g; 317 yds/290 m) Jam (06008) 1 ball or 225 yds/206 m MEASUREMENT(S) Body of Bag (excluding straps) Approximately 8” 20.5 cm
name: Ravelry: Seed Stitch Knot Bag pattern by Yarnspirations Design Studio
